citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 - 1 pm
on 19-Oct-16.
During that time the inspector waited at the facility and called the available phone number and left a message.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 - 1 pm
on 19-Oct-16.
During that time the inspector waited at the facility and called the available phone number and left a message.
